source: おうたが寝てから向かいます
seed: I'll head there after Outa goes to sleep

casual_50.new_translation: I'll head there once Outa's asleep

casual_75.new_translation: I'll head there when Outa's finally asleep

casual_100.new_translation: I'll head there when Outa finally crashes

polite_25.new_translation: I will head there after Outa goes to sleep
polite_25.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます

polite_50.new_translation: I shall proceed there after Outa retires for the night
polite_50.reverse_translation: おうたが就寝した後、そちらに向かうつもりです

polite_75.new_translation: I shall proceed there after Outa retires for the night.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 私はおうたが就寝した後、そこに向かうつもりです。

business_25.new_translation: I will head there after Outa goes to sleep
business_25.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます

business_50.new_translation: I will head there after Outa goes to sleep.
business_50.reverse_translation: おうたが寝た後でそちらに向かいます

business_75.new_translation: I will proceed to the location after Outa retires for the night.
business_75.reverse_translation: 私はおうたが寝た後にそちらに向かいます。

business_100.new_translation: I shall proceed to the designated location subsequent to Outa's retirement for the evening.
business_100.reverse_translation: 私は、おうたが夜に就寝した後、指定の場所に向かいます。

casual_50.reverse_translation: 財布忘れたよ、まったく。

casual_75.new_translation: I totally forgot my wallet, dude!

polite_100.new_translation: It seems that I have inadvertently left my wallet behind.

business_75.reverse_translation: 残念ながら財布を忘れたことをお伝えします。

business_100.reverse_translation: お知らせいたしますが、私はうっかり財布を置いてきてしまいました。

seed: Can you send it to me?

polite_75.new_translation: I would be grateful if you could send it to me.

polite_100.new_translation: I would be most grateful if you could be so kind as to send it to me.

business_25.new_translation: Could you possibly send it to me?
business_25.reverse_translation: 私にそれを送っていただけますでしょうか？

business_100.new_translation: Would you be able to send it to me, if possible?
business_100.reverse_translation: もし可能であれば、送っていただけますでしょうか？

casual_50.new_translation: I'd really like to hold you.
casual_50.reverse_translation: あなたを抱きたいと思ってる

casual_100.new_translation: I really wanna hug you so tight.

polite_50.reverse_translation: あなたを抱きたいと願っています

polite_75.reverse_translation: あなたを抱きたいと強く思っています

polite_100.new_translation: I ardently yearn to embrace you.

business_100.new_translation: I wish to hold you close.

source: 遅れてごめん、電車が止まってた
seed: Sorry I'm late, the train was stopped.

casual_25.new_translation: Sorry I'm late - the train was stuck.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん、電車が止まってた

casual_50.new_translation: Sorry I'm late, train was stuck.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん、電車止まってた

casual_75.new_translation: Sorry I'm late, train was totally stuck.
casual_75.reverse_translation: ごめん、電車マジで止まってた

casual_100.new_translation: Sorry I'm late, train was stuck solid.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 遅れてごめん、電車完全に止まってた

polite_25.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train was delayed.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 遅れてしまい申し訳ありません、電車が遅れていましたので。

polite_50.new_translation: I wish to apologize for my tardiness; the train was delayed.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことをお詫び申し上げます。電車が遅れていたもので。

polite_75.new_translation: I would like to offer my sincerest apologies for being late; the train experienced delays.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことを心よりお詫び申し上げます。電車が遅延しましたため。

polite_100.new_translation: I wish to extend my most sincere apologies for my tardiness; the train was subject to significant delays.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことを心よりお詫び申し上げます。電車が大幅な遅延に見舞われましたため。

business_25.new_translation: I apologize for being late; the train was delayed.
business_25.reverse_translation: 遅れてしまい申し訳ありません、電車が遅れていましたので。

business_50.new_translation: I would like to apologize for being late; the train was delayed.
business_50.reverse_translation: 遅れてしまい申し訳ございません。電車が遅れていたもので。

business_75.new_translation: I wish to extend my sincerest apologies for the tardiness; the train's delay was the cause.
business_75.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことを心よりお詫び申し上げます。電車の遅延が原因でした。

business_100.new_translation: I would like to express my deepest apologies for being late; the delay was caused by the train being stopped.
business_100.reverse_translation: 遅刻したことを深くお詫び申し上げます。電車が止まっていたことが遅延の原因でした。

casual_50.new_translation: I'm heading out tomorrow, gotta get going!

casual_75.reverse_translation: 明日はバタバタするから行かなくちゃ

casual_100.reverse_translation: 明日は消えるぜ、抜けなきゃ！

polite_75.reverse_translation: 私は明日行くつもりです

polite_100.reverse_translation: 私は明日出発する予定です。

business_50.reverse_translation: 明日は出席いたします。

business_75.new_translation: I will be in attendance tomorrow.
business_75.reverse_translation: 私は明日、参席いたします。

business_100.reverse_translation: 私は明日、参席いたします。

source: 9時半に新宿駅の南口で待ち合わせしよう

polite_100.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口に9時半に参集なさいますか？

business_25.new_translation: Shall we meet at the south exit of Shinjuku Station at 9:30?
business_25.reverse_translation: 新宿駅の南口で9時半に参りましょうか

business_50.new_translation: How about meeting at the south exit of Shinjuku Station at 9:30?
business_50.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口で9時半に会うのはいかがでしょうか？

business_75.new_translation: Shall we meet at the south exit of Shinjuku Station at 9:30?
business_75.reverse_translation: 新宿駅南口で9時半に参会しましょうか？

business_100.new_translation: We propose meeting at the south exit of Shinjuku Station at 9:30.

source: もし時間があれば、手伝ってもらえると助かるんだけど
seed: If you have time, I'd appreciate your help.

casual_25.new_translation: If you've got time, I could use your help.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 時間があったら手伝ってくれると助かるな

casual_50.new_translation: If you've got some time, I'd really appreciate your help.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 時間があったら、助かるんだけど。

casual_75.new_translation: If you've got a sec, I'd super appreciate your help.
casual_75.reverse_translation: ちょっといい時間あるなら、マジで手伝ってくれると嬉しいんだけど。

casual_100.new_translation: If you've got a minute, I'd really appreciate your help.
casual_100.reverse_translation: ちょっといい？手伝ってくれたら嬉しいんだけど。

polite_25.new_translation: If you have some spare time, I would be grateful for your assistance.
polite_25.reverse_translation: お時間があれば、お手伝いいただけると助かります。

polite_50.new_translation: If you could spare some time, I would appreciate your assistance.
polite_50.reverse_translation: お時間があれば、お手伝いいただければ幸いです。

polite_75.new_translation: If you could kindly spare some time, I would be most grateful for your assistance.
polite_75.reverse_translation: もしお時間をいただけましたら、ご助力に大変感謝いたします。

polite_100.new_translation: Were you to have a moment to spare, I should be exceedingly grateful for your assistance.
polite_100.reverse_translation: お時間がございましたら、お手伝いいただければ幸甚に存じます

business_25.new_translation: If you have some time to spare, I would be grateful for your assistance.
business_25.reverse_translation: もしお時間があれば、お手伝いいただけると助かります。

business_50.new_translation: If you have some time available, I would appreciate your help.
business_50.reverse_translation: お時間がおありでしたら、お手伝いいただければ幸いです。

business_75.new_translation: If you have some time available, I would be grateful for your assistance.
business_75.reverse_translation: お時間がおありでしたら、ご助力いただければ幸いです。

business_100.new_translation: Should you have the opportunity, I would appreciate your assistance.
business_100.reverse_translation: お時間がおありでしたら、ご助力いただければ幸いです。

source: 田中さんが来週の月曜に50人分の資料を持ってくるらしいよ
